thread.section_title: Hotel Forte - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION
thread.title_full: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION - Review of Hotel Forte, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Kristina S
title: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION
text: The hotel really is a 2 minute walk to the busiest streets on Rome, and the Spanish steps! Yes the " double room" was quite small, amd the bathroom also - even though there was a bath tub in there. The hotel was clean, the staff was friendly! I have stayed in other hotels near Termini station, and i highly advise in spending a little more money to be close in the center. Once again, the location of this hotel was everything!
